DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( study way drug enters leave blood tissue time ) JNJ-49122944 healthy male participant single intravenous ( [ IV ] within vein ) dose administration .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Study Single Intravenous Dose JNJ-49122944 Healthy Male Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind ( neither researcher participant know treatment participant receiving ) , randomize ( study drug assign chance ) , placebo-controlled ( inactive substance ; pretend treatment [ drug ] compare clinical trial drug test drug real effect ) , single-center study . The study consist Screening Period ( 2 21 day prior participant ' dose administration ) , Double-blind Treatment Period ( single dose JNJ-49122944 placebo Day 1 ) , Safety Follow-up Period ( 4 7 day discharge ) . The total duration participation participant , include screening , approximately 4 week . Blood sample collect assessment pharmacokinetic parameter . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
DOC.criteria: Male participant , age 18 55 inclusive Participant must body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) , inclusive , body weight less 50 kg Participant must deem healthy basis physical examination , medical history , laboratory test , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram within protocoldefined parameter perform screen Day 1 Participant agrees protocoldefined use effective contraception Participant nonnicotine user 6 month prior screen Participants current history clinically significant medical illness Participants history drug alcohol abuse within 5 year Routine consumption great 450 milligram ( mg ) caffeine per day participant Participants recent vaccination acute illness Blood donation major blood loss within 3 month prior study drug administration participant
